item.title: Whoami
item.description: Actually student in computer science and cybersecurity school Ecole 2600 and play with my CTF team 0xA28. I spend my time learning new things, code clashing and also skateboarding. I like sexy JDM cars and am a drift enthusiaist. I’m also interested in automobile cybersecurity (haven’t started learning this tho). “No need to worry, there’s still time” Whatilike Artemis Skateboarding Jazz and liquid DNB and sometimes listening to both Cryptography challenges Maths Unordered lists
[nofake] Peace in the world canceled by (Ri)cha(r)d Watterson: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-VgEVCJ-TCI&t=203s

item.title: Writeup - Least Significant Color
item.description: Bluehens CTF 2023 - Least significant color CTFtime I can’t decide which color is the least significant… red xor green? -azroberts So for this challenge we got an image file provided encoded.png. All we have to know is in the title AND in the description. Before giving the solution, we need to have in mind two things: Least significant bit (LSB) and the representation of an image. Reminder Images An image is basically a 2D list of tuples (R=red, G=green, B=blue) of 3 values.
